meanings.definition: A reproduction of a document made by using a photocopier.
meanings.sent1: I needed more photocopies of the report for everyone in the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The office manager made photocopies of the important contract for safekeeping.
meanings.sent3: The photocopies of the recipe were so clear that I could almost taste the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like photocopies of the past, vivid and detailed.
meanings.sent5: The stack of photocopies on the desk seemed to multiply on its own, like magic.

meanings.definition: To make a photocopy of a document.
meanings.sent1: She photocopies the notes before returning the book to the library.
meanings.sent2: Remember to photocopy your ID before submitting the application form.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he could photocopy himself to be in two places at once.
meanings.sent4: The artist's mind photocopies images from reality into his paintings.
meanings.sent5: The copier hummed softly as it diligently photocopies each page of the manual.
